title: bad stuff in NZ part 2
content:
This time it's political. I have just ‘blacked out' [100types](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016145051/http:/www.100types.com/) in protest over the coming legislation here – the ‘draconian’ s92A Copyright Amendment Act. If you know or deal with any New Zealanders online (_especially_ the creative ones), remind them to sign the petition at [The Creative Freedom Foundation](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016145051/http:/www.creativefreedom.org.nz/) and write to their MPs this week.

For evil to triumph, good men and women need do nothing\* – but if guilt upon accusation and the subsequent summary disconnection of one's online activities bothers you in any way – join the protest.

\*misattributed to Edmund Burke, apparently.

[Edit] just in at midnight our time... _"The Creative Freedom Foundation are celebrating tonight after National's announcement this afternoon that Section 92A will be scrapped, and that they will work towards finding an alternative."_

Normal service has been resumed; please do not adjust your set.
author: ben_archer
